basic.description:
A study of poetry, drama, and prose of the major writers of the period 1660-1800. Readings will be drawn from the works of writers such as Dryden, Pope, Swift, Johnson, Fielding, and Richardson.
NOTE    Also offered as a distance course. Consult Continuing and Distance Studies.
basic.subject: ENGL
basic.title: Restoration and 18th Century Literature

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite  (ENGL200 & ENGL290) and (a GPA of 2.4 on all ENGL units) and (registration in an ENGL Major or Medial Plan).
